laboratory_examinations.findings: 42.0 IU/L (Reference range: 0.0 - 100.0 IU/L), within normal range.

Significantly dilated common bile duct measuring up to 1.2 cm, no gallstones, mild central intrahepatic duct dilatation, small non-enhancing lesion in segment VII (hamartoma measuring 6 mm), geographic areas of relative hypoperfusion anteriorly in segment IVb, bilateral simple renal cysts (largest measuring 7.9 x 9.1 cm), no concerning liver lesions.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Comparison to previous study indicates continued significant dilation of the common bile duct without a discrete obstructing mass.
